column8: please configure your bot using #dobby commands
syntax: #dobby #reset (execute any time to reset/end a conversation)
syntax: #dobby #learn #when [ topic is <topic> and] [intent is <intent>] [and state is <state>] [and input is <input>] then [transition to [intent <intent>] [and state <state>] and] [say <phrase>]
trains dobby for a conversation exchange
syntax: #dobby #learn <alias> is #alias for <keyword> (trains dobby to learn a new alias for an input keyword>
syntax: #dobby #forget #when [ topic is <topic> and] [intent is <intent>] [and state is <state>] [and input is <input>]
makes dobby forget a conversation exchange
syntax: #dobby #list #losic (lists all training data logic populated currently)
syntax: #dobby #list #topic (lists all key words registered to parse a topic from a message)
syntax: #dobby #list #intent (lists all key words registered to parse an intent from a message)
syntax: #dobby #list #input (lists all key words registered to parse an input from a message)
